PREVIC: Parent Report of Expressive Vocabulary in Children

Vielen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Sprach-Fragebogen für Eltern von Vorschulkindern.

Zitation:
Bohn, M., Prein, J., Engicht, J., Haun, D., Gagarina, N., & Koch, T. (2025).
PREVIC: An adaptive parent report measure of expressive vocabulary in children between 3 and 8 years of age.
Behavior Research Methods, 57 (3), 95.
https://doi.org/10.3758/s13428-025-02615-4
